## App interface

Built application ready to run.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface App<State, _Components extends Record<string, unknown>> 
```

## Remarks

An `App` is created by calling [AppBuilder.build()](./dsl.appbuilder.build.md)<!-- -->. It provides a `run()` method to start the application event loop and a `getModel()` escape hatch to access the underlying TEA model for advanced use cases.

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[getModel()](./dsl.app.getmodel.md)


</td><td>

Get the underlying TEA model (escape hatch for advanced use cases).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[run()](./dsl.app.run.md)


</td><td>

Run the application and block until it quits.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
